definition: (northern dialect) to pick up a fare (as a taxi driver)/to pick up a piece of work (as a courier)
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
to live/alive/living/work/workmanship
to wildly exaggerate the meaning of sth (idiom)

sentences.english: Hurry up. Get up and start to work.

definition: to solicit (guests, clients, passengers etc)/to importune
taxi driver
unlicensed or unofficial taxi/unlicensed motor vehicle
taxi/(Tw) rental car
chauffeur/driver/CL:個|个[ge4]
motorcycle taxi/abbr. for 摩托車的士|摩托车的士[mo2 tuo1 che1 di1 shi4]
male taxi driver/cabbie (slang)
pedicab/tricycle
to tout/to solicit customers
to drive a vehicle for its owner (often as a paid service for sb who has consumed alcohol) (abbr. for 代理駕駛|代理驾驶[dai4 li3 jia4 shi3])/substitute driver (abbr. for 代駕司機|代驾司机[dai4 jia4 si1 ji1])
to take on a piece of work/to pick up some freelance work/(of a taxi driver) to pick up a fare

to dispatch a vehicle/(of a vehicle or its driver) to set off
private car
to act as substitute/to fill in for sb
person who joins with others to reduce costs (carpooling, group buying, sharing an apartment etc)
